targets.expr: avg(node_load1{instance=~"$instance", nodename=~"$node"} / on(instance) count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$instance", nodename=~"$node", mode='idle'}) by (instance)) * 100

(1 - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance=~"$instance", nodename=~"$node", fstype!="tmpfs", mountpoint="/"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance", nodename=~"$node", fstype!="tmpfs", mountpoint="/"}) * 100
